item.title: Stranger Things: All you need to know about season five
item.description: The first four episodes of the new series are set to be released in the UK on Thursday.

item.title: Army halts use of Ajax vehicles after soldiers fall ill
item.description: The UK government previously said they were ready for deployment with interest from Nato allies.

item.title: Couple have last dance at Blackpool ballroom before move to care home
item.description: Ron and Marilyn Hill hit the dancefloor one final time after their granddaughter's plea on TikTok.

item.title: WSL sorry after influencer drops ball and makes lewd jokes during draw
item.description: GK Barry makes a series of lewd jokes and accidentally drops a ball back in the bag during the draw for the Women's League Cup quarter-finals and semi...

item.title: Hull KR start Super League title defence at newcomers York
item.description: Treble winners Hull KR will start the defence of their Super League title with a visit to newly promoted York Knights.
